trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ger stöd för designtid i en visuell designer för den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metod kan anropas av design-värden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metoden kan vara kallas, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called by the design host.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metod kan anropas av design-värden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoden kan vara kallas, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Startar konfigurationsverktyget för datakällan i design-värden.

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en datakällvy som har det angivna namnet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to return.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på vyn för att returnera.

trans-unit.source: A object with the name specified by viewName.
trans-unit.target: En objekt med namnet som angetts av viewName .

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of available views.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en lista över tillgängliga vyer.

trans-unit.source: A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".
trans-unit.target: En samling med ett element med namnet "DefaultView".

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Initierar kontrollen designer och läser in den angivna komponenten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> object to initialize.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objektet initieras.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>-egenskapen för den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>

trans-unit.target: Värdet för den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy*>

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Används av designer för att lägga till egenskaper eller ta bort egenskaper i rutnätet för egenskaper, eller shadow egenskaperna för den associerade kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denna medlem åsidosätter <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The properties to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som ska filtreras.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Uppdaterar schemat från den underliggande datakällan.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om du vill ignorera alla datakällhändelser tills schemat uppdateras.
